评论详情: So I did try to wear these. I really should have returned them but I had hoped they would work out... But they didn't. They are a size or two too small!  I can wear them for a super short walk in the early morning, like an hour or less. But my mistake came when I tried to dumbly do an all day walk wearing these. My toes ended up banging against the very front of the shoe and my big toenail turned purple!  So I have worn these very little. A few short walks, one long all day walk (and that ended up being very painful indeed)....  The bottoms get VERY SLIPPERY on wet surfaces!! I know the bottoms have those texture things but if you are crossing a wet street those white lines - oye - super slippery!! I would not dare to think of wearing these on ice! No way!!  These are barefoot style shoes so free of arch support. Which is what I had wanted.  I do love the insoles that came with these shoes. I wish they were sold separately. I am using them at the moment in another pair of shoes.  I am unsure why that right shoe is so crooked and leaning? I have hardly wore these at all. Maybe 5 hours total for the short walks and the long walk was probably another 4 or 5 hours?  Its hard to judge the quality as I got the wrong size but it was the size that Amazon had said was my size. Clearly they are way off! My big toe is literally jammed at the front of the shoe and that is the shoe with no insoles in it.  The depth ( with no insoles) is good and so is the shoe width.  Oh for comparison these were a size 38. In the Xero Prio I wear a size 8 and in the Dbeck I am wearing a 9. My Xero sandals are also an 8.  The shoes seem sturdy and they do seem well made. They are just too small for my feet! If you wear an 8 in Xero you probably need a size larger than a 38 in these. Or else you will get purple toes like I did! My toenail is still purple.
Easy slip on with velcro gripping.  I've walked in the woods, did yard work with them. Good protection, comfortable and seem to be very durable after using a few months.
Terrific shoes, with maximum comfort.  Note: they run small, so buy one size larger than you ordinarily wear.

评论概述: The shoes took to long to get here the size is off i order size they are size 8
评论详情: The shoes took to long to get here the size is off i order size they are size 8
I live in the desert and need more than flip-flops to go outside and to the pool. These work perfectly for this and are easy to take on and off.
Extremely comfortable!..I wear a 14 and I wear these allday..they feel great, I've ordered 2 more pairs and I love them!.

I've been wearing these as my gym shoe for at least a month now. Still only walking on the treadmill, just to get my feet / leg / calves used to the difference. I own a pair of basic Vibram Fivefingers. These are MUCH easier to adapt to wearing. They are very flexible and breathable, but not so thin that you can feel everything on the ground (like Vibram's). There are no toe pockets. I have Morton's toe (my first toe is as long as / slightly longer than my big toe), which I read AFTER purchasing the Vibram Fivefingers makes them not a good fit for my foot. No problems at all with this shoe!

I have bunions on both feet and regular shoes just wasn't cutting it. I had a friend that said you need to try barefoot shoes they really work, so I did and she was right. I love them and getting ready to buy my second pair 😍
They fit like a glove

Great transition (indoor/outdoor) shoe.I live in central america and all floors are tiled.  I was looking for a non flip-flop type shoe that would provide just enough cushion, but still give the barefoot feel.  These are great.  Comfortable and true to size, so I have since ordered a 2nd pair.
Light weight 😁
Feel the ground with your feet. Very good for weightlifting since flat I like doing squats in these.
This is an excellent purchase. They are super comfortable especially on dirt road surfaces. no achy feet after long wear.
I did as suggested and bought my shoe size but boy they were like a whole size too big. They’re comfy and feel super durable though! But we’re just too big for my feet :(

The shoes fit good both with and without socks.  I use the liner.  They have been comfortable on my five mile roundtrip bicycle trips, I wear them in both Barre and Strength Training classes and regular one mile walks with my dog.  I don't yet know if they will provide a long term solution to neuropathy but I am hopeful.  I am happy with my purchase.
They didn't feel right and just weren't the shoe I was looking for.
Very comfortable great fit. Is there comfortable with or without socks. If you like going barefoot like I do it and makes you feel like you're almost barefoot.

So much uglier than the pictures. This might be the only non-defective product from Amazon that I ever returned. They're THAT ugly. I cringed when I pulled them out of the box.  If you don't mind the way they look, they seemed like decent shoes for the price. But I think there are better barefoot options (including from Saguaro)!
So comfortable and cushiony and really helps ease bunion pain.  I can wear them all day, no problem. Might be getting their hiking shoes.
Size fits perfectly and one of my favorite shoes to wear in summer.
LOVELY, GREAT, COMFORTABL All ideas listed below. I

I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE SHOES! My back pain has decreased tremendously. I’m a nurse who works 12 hours shifts. These shoes are the best shoes. Truly barefoot feeling. Light weight. Flexible. If you like being barefoot you will love these shoes.

评论概述: All black version is a size smaller than other versions
评论详情: The all black version runs small! I love the comfort of these shoes. I bought the black and pink ones a few months ago and they are extremely comfortable. Only tennis shoes I wear anymore! I just bought the all black ones because I need all black shoes for certain events. However, even though they are the exact same size, they're too small! I tried wearing them for a bit to see if I would be able to live with it, but my big toes already hurt after only a few minutes. And the unfortunate part is that I'm a size 8.5, but the next available size up is a 9.5 rather than a 9. I'm SUPER bummed!

I bought a pair of these about a month ago, size 41 (gray and pink in photo). Loved them. SO comfortable. Bought an identical pair, same Amazon website page, same size, same style but in black, size 41, and they are significantly smaller! A good 1/2" shorter, significantly less wide, and the toebox is more sharply angled to remove toe room. I have regular (non-barefoot) shoes that give more toebox room. I have one other pair of Sagauro that is really much larger than a 41. I can't keep these. And I won't buy another pair from this manufacturer. Their sizing is NOT RELIABLE.
Uncomfortable, tight, my water shoes fit better.

Oh, how I truly wished these worked out. They are not durable enough for my 11yr. old that lives them and loved them. The strapped snapped and broke off at the fold/wrap. My window has closed to return so we will get search for another pair for school; any suggestions?
So comfortable and easy to put on
I tried 3 different sizes and none worked. Beautiful shoes but had to send it back because my size was “murdering” my toenails. And the suze up was too large

评论概述: Saguaro > Whitin for budget every day shoe
评论详情: I've had these for about 4 months now and they're pretty great. Had a pair of Whitin Barefoot Trail shoes for a little over a year. These have a more attractive eccentric styling (neither are very aesthetically normal looking). These also slightly better quality.  The overall dimensions are identical, but the upper shoe is sturdier (without any additional restriction) giving less of a sock/slipper feel and making them easier to put on.  I was also not pleased with some of my service interactions over the Whitin shoes.  Next time I'll be buying Saguaro over Whitin for a budget daily barefoot shoe again.

Way brighter than I thought. They are nice shoes and work fine. Though when you tighten them they often still become loose with enough walking, but it’s not like you’ll be doing any quick moving sports in them. And if you have smaller feet, the shoe may fit you fine, but you’ll might have a good deal of extra elastic if you tighten it real tight.
Buying another I love them so much
A fantastic barefoot shoe I have zero complaints about. I wear them every day. I can’t wear anything else now.

评论概述: Great for what they're meant for
评论详情: They fit very well and are extremely comfortable. They color is fun and look like the picture. They are well made and fit my feet well. I wouldn't walk on sharp gravel or do construction work in them, but yard work, walking, going to the beach are all great. Id say it was a good value for the money.

It takes some getting used to. I’d recommend to wear a few hours a day until you’re acclimated to them. They are comfortable and a great value compared to some others. I’ll be buying more in different colors! Good quality shoe!

评论概述: Great fit, extremely light and comfortable!
评论详情: Great fit, extremely light and comfortable! If you snug the laces up well, this shoe provides a decent amount of very comfortable support for your foot. Great for casual, all purpose walking, maybe even light or gravel trail.

评论概述: Hot-Will work great for work from home winter slippers
评论详情: I go barefoot all summer, so I was excited for something I could wear on the gravel road for dog walks. I wear them with bombas socks and my feet are very hot, even when riding in the car.

I had been dealing with sore feet for years, and learned about "bare foot" running shoes. I did lost of research and comparison shopping, before jumping in and deciding to try these SAGUARO Barefoot Minimalist Shoes. To my surprise, they are very comfortable, I can feel my feet flexing, my toes more active when walking or running. I hadn't realized how much my feet hurt until they stopped. For the price, these shoes are a bargain. I am ordering a couple more pair. I definitely recommend giving them a try. UPDATE: Second pair is smaller. This pair is too small and uncomfortable. My toes are crampted. Inconsistent sizes is a big issue. I will not by anymore. Unfortunate.

评论概述: Love these but more toe coverage
评论详情: I walk the beach every morning doing turtle surveys, then during the day doing shell and crab surveys. This is my second pair and I love them!  Don't end up with a shoe full of sand and they drain and dry quickly!Only complaint, I have figity toes.  My big toe usually makes a hole in the top before any other part wears.  When that happens, they fill with sand😢 and have to go.

I’ve used Vibram five fingers for about a decade and gave these a try because they looked similar but they don’t feel similar.  Because there are no “finger” holds like Vibram the front of the foot doesn’t feel securely in place.  They felt floppy to me and I didn’t feel confident I could safely run or do yoga in them.  I’d rather pay extra for the value Vibram provides.  I returned these.  I suppose they are sufficient for less athletic purposes but they just seem like a knockoff to me.

It’s not the first shoe I bought from this brand Saguaro and all of my shoes of this brand are size 38. I ordered the equivalent of size 38 EU and it arrived smaller. Whoever wants to buy this shoe - size up one size larger than your usual.
My 13 year old replaced his usual sneakers and crocs with these on our barefoot journey. They held up washing in the machine, they are versatile, cheaper than crocs and sneakers so a great value.
very comfortable. use for walking the dog on the street and hiking. width is good for my wide feet without making my feet look huge.
Son muy buenos zapatos pero pide una talla más que la tuya pues vienen pequeños una talla
Really comfortable and fit perfectly. The moment I put them on, I loved them. Going to buy more!

评论概述: Very comfortable  barefoot shoes will buy again
评论详情: I had been checking these out for awhile and decided to purchase. they do run small. I ordered a 9.5 as that is my normal sneaker size and I had to return to get a size 10 which is size 41eu. The sizes run like the five finger barefoot shoes. The color isn't as vivid in the photos... but they are my new favorite workout shoes!
The toe box feels so big. I enjoy the toe space. I am not sure it is life changing like some people seem to say.

I love zero shoes! I have neuropathy in left foot. I’ve had 4 foot surgeries & the last one was botched by fusing my big, 2nd & 3rd toes which has thrown my spine & gait to be permanently out of alignment. Along with neuropathy I have back pain, especially in the wrong shoes. Zero shoes doesn’t require breaking it, they are comfortable the minute you put them on & can hike or wear them all day pain free! Zero shoes put your body back in alignment. Zero shoes are different from water shoes. They are sturdier & have a thicker better sole. I own 4 pair & ordering another pair today. They are washable & dryable. You can’t wrong with these shoes. They have a wide boxed toe so your feet aren’t scrunched up in them. They aren’t slippery so you have a good grip if hiking or on slick flooring. They have so many styles & cool colors. They are not waterproof but dry very quickly. For the price you can’t beat a zero shoe.

I have used them for casual slip ons and for minimalist running.  I am happy with the performance in each situation.  It feels nearly like wearing nothing, and the sole protects nicely against surface irregularities.  I like that they do not feel flimsy, and they have held up well over the last few months of wear.

I’ve had these shoes over a year and they are just starting to show toe wear. I suggest adding two layers of different inserts. I don’t love the knobby toe look - I prefer the same style but with just a more streamlined toe area look, or perhaps a swoosh around the big toe without the bumpy looking edge. Overall I am very happy with these shoes. I might consider one if their new models that have leather and the streamlined look, but the price has dramatically increased.
They are breathable and flexible
Sooooo easy on the feet.  Easy to put on.  Great product

I'd order a size smaller than I usually wear (Men's 12) as these felt slushy on my feet, and very very wide. I've laced them up as tight as they can go and I still feel them wandering around as I walk. Great feel though other than maybe I'd prefer something a little more snug.
IT is so comfortable I bought a pair for my mom.
Feel like slippers that I can wear outside. They do take a while to dry if they get wet, but so far so good !

My son had these shoes and I wanted a pair for myself. The sizing however runs small in my opinion. I normally wear a 10.5 - 11 in womens and ordered the women's shoes in size 11.  My toes were squished up against the front of the shoe, however, so I am returning and ordering the next size up.  However, they did feel nice on in all the other aspects, although I haven't had a chance to actually use them yet, so I will try to update this review at that time. My son is on his second pair, however, so I feel like they are good shoes.  I'm just taking one star off for the sizing at this point. I think it would help if they had a size guide as the shoes are sized in International sizes, so having a conversion chart would be helpful as I don't think the sizes were translated well. I've worn a 43 in the past and these are a 42.

These feel amazing! Excellent quality! The sole is super thick and rugged. My first pair of barefoot shoes after wanting the Vibram FiveFingers for years, thought I’d give these a shot before spending $120 on those. I am a solid size 10 shoe in every brand, but had to size up to an 11 in these. I’m wondering about their durability/longevity, but at this price point, I don’t mind if they only last a year or two so I could determine if they’ll work for my needs. They look very well made.

I hate that I am just now discovering barefoot shoes but they really are a game changer. Super comfortable, grippy and allow for so much more feel between your feet and the ground. They are perfect for pickleball. There are many different manufacturers but Saguaro makes some of the best barefoot shoes available. They are modestly priced too. I'll wear nothing but barefoot shoes the rest of my life.
I wear these all day every day for any activity.

评论概述: Heel is too high for me
评论详情: I like the product and I can wear them with socks that go past my ankle. The one day I wore then barefooted, I wound up bleeding on the shoe from having the back of my foot rubbed raw.  With having had used them, I could not return them do they are sitting on the floor waiting for my foot to heal. I’ll decide at a later date if I want to try them again.  If you buy them just make sure they fit both of your feet perfectly.
These are good and wish they had a bit more comfort. They do have a lot of room for your feet.

They are comfortable. They are lightweight. They helped with the cramps in my feet. I ordered a half size bigger than normal, but my toe on one foot rubs and I can’t wear them for long distances. They didn’t work out for Disney walking like I had hoped. Could just be my foot, I don’t really blame the shoe
These shoes are so comfortable. They're not like any other shoes I've had. They fit well. It almost feels like you're not wearing shoes.
Muy cómodos y confortables. Respetuosos con los pies
Nice cushy feel.....comfortable....Size was right on....

评论概述: Water shoes. Yes. Anything else, No.
评论详情: I walk every day and was excited to come across this product that was market it to make your feet feel better and your walks or whatever you want to use them for feel better. However, for the past three days I have worn these shoes and each day, all I could think of was returning this issue. I’m not returning them because I have a vacation coming up, and I will just use them for my water shoes. I gave it three stars styling. However, for me, we are all different, but, they are not as comfortable as they are portrayed to be, and you definitely feel, the ground. I will purchase them possibly for water, but for walking or anything else, I would not purchase them for.

评论概述: Comfortable shoes if you wear them for a short time. Painful afterwards.
评论详情: These shoes have very wide shoe box and this is very good. Here is a sad story. I walked 8 hours a day in these shoes at work for about 1 month and my feet never were so comfortable like in these shoes. But I developed pain in my feet in about 1 month. I switched to walking shoes with thicker bottom and my feet started slowly recovering. It took about 2 months for my feet to feel better.
It’s almost like being barefoot.
Best thing I’ve ever done for my feet.

These are very comfortable and I like to wear them inside on my treadmill. However, I wouldn't wear them in public. Appearance is personal preference but I find them excessively wide, making it look like I have duck feet. With that said, I think any wide footed or heavy set person would appreciate the extra room.
I bought these for my wife and she said she didn’t wanna wear then she started wearing them and now that’s the only thing she wears

评论概述: Excellent zero drop, minimal workout shoe
评论详情: I’m impressed with the feel, quality and look of the Saguaro shoes. I try to use them at least a few hours or more during a 24 hr. time period. They have strengthened my foot muscles and repaired my tiny corns in my forefoot. Highly recommend!
Comfortable and they work for me in the gym.  My gym bro says they are frog green, but he has a belly so who cares.  Gig 'em
I had bought another pair with a different brand name and these are 10 times better. Very comfortable, sturdy around the heal to easily slide off and on. I wear these all the time.
Easy to wear, easy to use, and feels great.

I was looking for a shoe that was easy to wear, lightweight and comfortable. Also shoes that added stability and felt more like walking barefoot but with protection. After reading reviews I decided to try this pair. Today when I picked them up from my mailbox I immediately put them on and I was extremely pleased with the fit and feel of them. I then hit the trail up our hill and could tell immediately that these shoes were everything I wanted. I instantly felt more grounded to the trail, was able to increase my walking speed without losing stability and the soles offered enough traction to avoid slipping. In fact I made it up 100 steps to the next trailhead so quickly and easily I was amazed. The return trip down the trail is always more challenging for me as it puts pressure on my knees but I felt no pain as I quickly made my way down. The one review that really sold me was made by a 64 year old woman and as I am the same age I was more inclined towards buying these shoes. I’m very pleased with my purchase, they were on sale when I bought them so that was a bonus. I got the color pink and I love it!
This is my second pair of barefoot shoes and I adore these. So comfortable and reduce for pain.
Good fit, comfortable and nice width
It's a good shoe for the price, espically if you are looking for a barefoot shoe but don't want to commit to the $100+ of some of the name brands. Comfortable to run in, and good for everyday wear.
Flexible, breathable, nice wide toe box. Runs about a 1/2 size small.🩵

These are inexpensive and comfortable. I like to feel the ground beneath my feet. My orthotic insoles for my planar fasciitis  slid right in and fit like a glove. My toe base is wide and these accommodate that nicely. It was necessary to work up to longer walks and hikes. But that only took a few times around the neighborhood. Pleasantly surprised at how well these shoes function and feel. Only drawback is that the tongue kind of rolls around when putting them on. I think a needle and thread might help them stay in place. Great deal!

I've been wearing barefoot/minimalist shoes for two years and finding the right shoe has been challenging. The moment I put these on, I knew they were perfect. The material is extremely comfortable; not too loose nor too snug. Toe box provides sufficient room and the tread is ready for some off-road. The shoe does run small so going up a size was definitely the way to go.

I have a wide foot and these are so soft and comfortable. I have not worn them on a hike but as a daily shoe. They are so light that they feel cheap, but they look good and I will buy another pair when these wear out.
I’m a big fan of vibram five finger shoes, and these give you the same barefoot feel. Well made, super comfy! I’m ordering more in different colors!
Absolutely comfortable 12 HRS shifts

评论概述: Great product at an excellent price!
评论详情: We live in the desert. In the house, all year long, I’m barefoot or in flip flops. Always thought I needed extra support for work, or any activity that involved being on my feet for an extended amount of time. I was pleasantly surprised that these shoes worked even better for me. I can feel the surface of wherever I’m walking. At 68, I find that extremely helpful in keeping my balance, and it also keeps my legs more relaxed.  Fewer aches and pains, and no leg cramps at night.

I wanted a shoe for Tai Chi and stretching that would protect my feet yet allow me to feel my shifting weight. This turned out to be perfect. It's very comfortable. It feels similar to walking barefoot with a bit of support and protection. Also pretty easy to put on and take off. Good for working in public spaces where you don't want to actually be barefoot. Also have good traction, not slippery on ceramic tile or hardwood surfaces. Flexible and can be rolled up and take little space in your workout bag. Benefits of feeling like being barefoot, yet light protection for your feet.

My husband bought these Saguaros for me, and I will be forever grateful.  They are the best fit of any athletic shoe I have ever worn.  The wide toe box is perfect for my troubled feet.  It’s a shoe for any activity.  At age 82, I love to put them on and walk outside or on the treadmill.  The rubber sole is an extra perk that keeps me stable.  I have worn these gorgeous shoes (rose mauve, size 8, one-half size larger than usual), for two days straight.  Did I say Gorgeous??  I’m so happy with this fine shoe that I want to buy a wardrobe to match!
Se ven de Buenas calidad pero eviaron talla incorrecta a la solicitada
Very comfortable

评论概述: Styles fit differently, size is an issue .  Junk shoes
评论详情: A size 12 in one style may be too large, but in a different style it may be too small.  Face it, they’re just overpriced junky shoes.  Comfort…there is none to be had.
These shoes irritated my ankle area. Had to return.
So far, so good!
I now have 2 pairs of these shoes and have suggested them to several people I know.

I've been dealing with foot/ankle issues for years. Podiatrists, arch supports, braces - done it all.  Finally listened to my body (I grew up barefoot!); decided to try these. I can garden and work around our farm in comfort!  I'm sure my Dr's would not understand...lol....but the best thing I've done!  Sturdy but flexible soles are great! Highly recommend
Love the look,  weight and the feel. It's like having nothing on your feet.
I love the comfort of barefoot shoes but I wanted a pair that looks more summery. These were beautiful being what I expected and will go with most anything. They are so comfortable and well made

La medida del zapato no está indicada en la publicación ya que solo cuenta con indicación europea, escogí número 10 y llegó 41 más pequeño de lo que esperaba, aún así los zapatos son extremadamente cómodos y aunque son más pequeños de lo que esperaba no se nota para nada la diferencia de tamaño
Perfect for my wide front foot tight enough on the heel so it doesn’t slip. I really like them hopefully they’ll last.
You get what you pay for I guess. These broke the first time I used them. The stitching to hold the laces tore off.

I haven't worn another pair of shoes since I purchased these! They're beyond comfortable, super easy to put on. Wear with or without socks. If you're into the barefoot revolution these are for you! I've had significant pain relief, and my  posture has gotten better since I've worn these. They weigh next to nothing. They're come in many different colors. The grip is perfect, I've gone hiking in them once with no issues. They are extremely breathable, probably not best of you don't want your feet getting wet. I've washed them twice since I've had them, and theyve held up great. They come out looking brand new. Purchased for my son and he only ever wants to wear these!!!
